text: Gzim Rexhaj (born 8 June 1986) is a Slovenian footballer of Albanian descent who plays as a forward and is a coach for SSVg Heiligenhaus in Germany.Footballdatabase profileKicker profile ==References== ==External links== * German career stats - FuPa Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian emigrants to Germany Category:Slovenian people of Albanian descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Slovenian footballers Category:Albanian footballers Category:ND Gorica players Category:KFC Uerdingen 05 players Category:Slovenian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Slovenian expatriate sportspeople in Germany
title: Gzim Rexhaj
